title: Another World Survival: Min-Maxing my Support and Summoning Magic
other_titles: ぼくは異世界で付与魔法と召喚魔法を天秤にかける
author: Tsukasa Yokotsuka
description:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

volumes.title: Another World Survival: Volume 01
volumes.description:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

					Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

volumes.title: Another World Survival: Volume 02
volumes.description:
Having freed the girls’ dormitory from the orcs’ clutches, Kazuhisa and the others quickly move to recover any survivors within.

Though the dead far outnumber the living, Kazuhisa’s glad to have gained new members for the Cultivation Center. However, the world is cruel, and things don’t always play out the way one envisions it to.

When Kazuhisa finds the Cultivation Center is under threat of being completely destroyed by an army of orcs, he’s forced to consider all possibilities of survival—even if it means forming an alliance with one of the people he hates the most.

volumes.title: Another World Survival: Min-maxing my Support and Summoning Magic - Volume 3
volumes.description:
Kazuhisa Kaya and Tamaki happened upon Tagamiya Yuuki, brother of Mia and leader of the ninja department, while they were walking through the woods. The three of them attack the first men’s dormitory where Shiba Sasou is located in order to reclaim Mia’s arm and Alice. Kazuhisa with a huge power advantage over Shiba, made a ruthless decision..

The next day, Kazuhisa and and the others set out for a cave to vanquish a newly-appeared bee monster; but what they encounter there leaves them speechless...

volumes.title: Another World Survival: Min-maxing my Support and Summoning Magic - Volume 4
volumes.description: The supernatural force of the Globster transported Kazuhisa Kaya, and Mia to another area, where they were met with a group of menacing creatures wreaking havoc on the town. They watched in horror as people’s lives were taken away right before their eyes and decided to join the fight against the monsters. Meanwhile, a mysterious figure seemed to be observing them from above.

title: Love under the Blue Moon: Falling in Love Again
author: Mii Hirose
description:
It was August, and the “Blue Moon” had come around – a phenomenon wherein two full moons appear in the same month.

As a seventeen-year-old, I found myself in Arashiyama, Kyoto, at my grandmother’s house for a somber funeral. It was on this solemn occasion that a peculiar encounter awaited me. Under the radiant light of the first full moon, I stumbled upon a mysterious sight. There before me was a young girl, gracefully using an umbrella to scoop water from a spring, her actions illuminated by the moon’s ethereal glow.

She said, “I’ll be here until the Blue Moon ends,” and despite our same ages, she had a mysterious aura about her, as if hiding a great secret.

That secret was that “I’ve been waiting for you in the future.”

This is a love story stretching across time and space, depicting two people bound by fate.

volumes.title: Love under the Blue Moon: Falling in Love Again
volumes.description:

title: The Fruit of Evolution
other_titles: 進化の実 ～知らないうちに勝ち組人生～
author: Miku
description:
One day, Hiragi Seiichi’s entire school is transported to another world. As he wanders through a mysterious forest alone, however, he is ‘attacked’ by a gorilla.

“Me never sleep with man before. Be gentle.”

All Saria wants is to be close to him. Just when he begins opening his heart to the feminine simian, however, tragedy strikes.

Can the strength of their bond—and the mysterious Fruits of Evolution they’ve both consumed—bring about a miracle?
A lighthearted fantasy-comedy romp through a fantasy world!

volumes.title: The Fruit of Evolution: Volume 01
volumes.description:
One day, Hiragi Seiichi’s entire school is transported to another world. As he wanders through a mysterious forest alone, however, he is ‘attacked’ by a gorilla.

“Me never sleep with man before. Be gentle.”

All Saria wants is to be close to him. Just when he begins opening his heart to the feminine simian, however, tragedy strikes.

Can the strength of their bond—and the mysterious Fruits of Evolution they’ve both consumed—bring about a miracle?
A lighthearted fantasy-comedy romp through a fantasy world!

volumes.title: The Fruit of Evolution: Volume 02
volumes.description:
After vanquishing Zeanos, Seiichi and Saria are finally able to leave the Forest of Endless Heartbreak. They make for the Royal Capital of Terbelle and attempt to register at the guild as adventurers. However, the guild is a den of perverts and deviants, from the sadistic receptionist and the speedo-clad bodybuilding guildmaster! Seiichi is left equal parts repulsed and confused—until he is introduced to his entrance exam proctor, the gorgeous Altria the Calamity. Rumor has it that whoever gets close to her is stricken with endless misfortune…

Wherever Seiichi goes, the fantasy hijinks are sure to follow in the highly-anticipated second volume of the Fruit of Evolution!

volumes.title: The Fruit of Evolution: Volume 03
volumes.description:
After clearing the Black Dragon God’s dungeon with the help of the beautiful adventurer Altria, Seiichi and Saria are accepted into the Guild as full-fledged members. Not long after starting his work, he decides to buy a horse, but takes a liking to Lulune the donkey instead. That’s all fine and well-Seiichi ends up registering his new steed in the great Capital Cup Derby! Meanwhile, the country his classmates were summoned in-the Kaizell Empire-begins moving in the shadows, and the demonkin of the Demon Realm reply in turn?

The third explosive volume of The Fruit of Evolution has finally arrived!

volumes.title: The Fruit of Evolution: Volume 04
volumes.description:
Thanks to Seiichi’s efforts, the Kingdom of Windberg is able to stave off an attempt on its king’s life. At nearly the same time, however, a different assassin attacks the ruler of the Kaizell Empire, where Seiichi’s classmates are being held. Kaizell’s strongest knight Zakiya pursues the attacker, the heinous Hellsmoke. When the mighty knight finally catches his mark, however, the horrible truth behind the Empire is revealed!

The Empire, Adventurers’ Guild, demonkin, and Heroes finally cross paths in the dynamic fourth volume of The Fruit of Evolution!
